about_the_game:
DLC Origins is an addition to CarX Drift Racing Online, having been waited so long by real connoisseurs of Japanese style. It includes 3 new vinyl for popular cars among which any driver will find a car to his taste.
The composition of DLC - Origins includes:
  • Spector RS - Rage
  • Asura M1 - Warrior
  • Midnight - Military Fury

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
